title: Failed to load URL file:///role/landing/ with error (-6).
body: Hey when i opened the LOL launcher it says Failed to load URL file:///role/landing/ with error (-6). while everything shows up as blank. And the "play" button on top doesnt show up as normally it would. Was wondering if theres any solution to fix this. Thanks

replies.body:
Hi,

I wasn't able to load the attachment for some reason.

From what you describe, it sounds like your client has become corrupted during the patching process.

Is this happening after installing today's patch? Or are you yet to go through the patching process?

-Mindstar

I've been able to play before today,although the error has been consistenly popping up but I was able to play with the "play" button available, however as you said theres a patch coming up and i think its the patching that is having issues on. I'm unable to patching on as things shows up as blank and i cant play the game as well.

There are a few options that you could try in the [Patcher Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support page, like forcing a re-patch or repairing game files.

If you aren't able to get those to work, I'd suggest doing a complete [reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends), as that should replace any files that are missing.  If you do this, make sure to remove all of the previous League of legends files, so that the new install is 100% fresh.

I have another copy of League of legend on my USB,however as i try to open that one, a window pops up and says"could not connect to HTTP server". I will try to re-install the game anyway and see if that works.
Looks like you're missing a file for the patcher to read from
I've re-uploaded the image,however it seems like it could only be viewed from the page instead of opening it and close-view.
Your image fails to load as my browser does not support your character set. Could you please rename the file to use UTF-8 encoding.
Yea i just found out my image crashed and was unable to load for some reason, how do i rename it?
